attributes.name: Black-lacquered Helm Chandelier
attributes.description: This wheel once belonged to the ship of the best-dressed pirate crew in the South Seas.

attributes.name: Brass Candelabra
attributes.description: This candelabra was recovered from a French shipwreck. Its exquisite detail was revealed once the barnacles were scrubbed off.

attributes.name: Bronze Candelabra
attributes.description: The patina on this well-preserved candelabra gives away its immense age.

attributes.name: Candle Cluster
attributes.description: These candles were just friends, at first, but they got too close. Now they are fused together into a super candle.

attributes.name: Captain Quicksilver's Lamp, Bronze Replica
attributes.description: Captain Quicksilver's Lamp sparked a craze, and replicas like this one soon became the most-requested item in the furniture workshops of Tortuga.

attributes.name: Captain Quicksilver's Lamp, Gold Replica
attributes.description: Soon, anyone who was anyone in the pirating world had to have a Quicksilver lamp. This solid gold example was the subject of one fierce bidding war and two subsequent assassinations.

attributes.name: Captain Quicksilver's Lamp, Original
attributes.description: The final request of infamous pirate James 'Quicksilver' Forten was that his skull be turned into a wall lamp.

attributes.name: Captain Quicksilver's Lamp, Silver Replica
attributes.description: The craze for Quicksilver lamps lasted only a few years. This late-model silver lamp was sold at a deep discount, as most pirates had moved on to the next big thing.

attributes.name: Chrysanthemum Standing Lantern
attributes.description: For some reason, the oil in this elaborate iron lantern seems to last twice as long as it should.

attributes.name: Cool Iron Chandelier - Bright
attributes.description: The cool tones of this chandelier's light are intended to mimic daylight, to help get you through those long Aeternian winters.

attributes.name: Cool Iron Chandelier - Dim
attributes.description: Azoth threads woven through the wicks of these candles provide a subtle blue-ish glow, and are also said to cause vivid dreams.

attributes.name: Cool Iron Lantern - Bright
attributes.description: This lantern casts a clean, sharp light, like the sun reflecting off fresh snow.

attributes.name: Cool Iron Lantern - Dim
attributes.description: This lantern is perfect for sitting around and telling ghost stories late at night.

attributes.name: Cool Iron Sconce - Bright
attributes.description: The cool light from this wall sconce helps you make calm, rational decisions. Popular with doctors and accountants.

attributes.name: Cool Iron Sconce - Dim
attributes.description: Do you consider yourself more of a winter person? Then this is the perfect wall sconce for you!

attributes.name: Cutout Standing Lantern
attributes.description: If you die out in the wilderness, this cheerful lantern will light a safe path for your soul to return.

attributes.name: Eight-tasseled Hanging Lantern
attributes.description: This majestic eight-tasseled hanging lantern was once reserved for use only in the imperial palace.

attributes.name: Festival Hanging Lantern
attributes.description: Every day is a party with this red paper lantern. There are no exceptions.

attributes.name: Festival Wall-mounted Lantern
attributes.description: This red triple lantern provides three times the protection against evil spirits.

attributes.name: Four-tasseled Hanging Lantern
attributes.description: The light from this lucky lantern is said to scare away hungry monsters that lurk in the darkness.

attributes.name: Gold Candelabra
attributes.description: A body washed up onshore with this solid gold candelabra strapped to its back. Unfortunately, it did not make a good flotation device.

attributes.name: Hardworking Helm Chandelier
attributes.description: This wheel once guided a mighty ship. Now, it'll help guide you through the dark.

attributes.name: Iron-bound Wall-mounted Lantern
attributes.description: With iron banding and a waterproof, fireproof coating, this lantern could withstand a hurricane.

attributes.name: Pirate Nightlight
attributes.description: Young pirates who use this nightlight no longer fear the dark. There are so many other things to fear instead.

attributes.name: Reflector Lamp
attributes.description: The clever use of reflection produces twice the light.

attributes.name: Round Standing Lantern
attributes.description: Its unique round design allows it to shed its light equally in all directions.

attributes.name: Rusty Hanging Lantern
attributes.description: A simple lantern hanging from above, shining light into the highest nooks and crannies.

attributes.name: Rusty Iron Candelabra
attributes.description: Three tall candles, burning bright, keeping back the endless night.

attributes.name: Rusty Iron Lantern
attributes.description: This lantern glows with love. But don't touch it. Its love could burn.

attributes.name: Salt-stripped Helm Chandelier
attributes.description: After a long, hard life at sea, this ship's wheel is exploring other career options.

attributes.name: Silver Candelabra
attributes.description: Miraculously untarnished despite decades spent underwater.

attributes.name: Simple Wall-mounted Lantern
attributes.description: The simplicity of this paper lantern means that nothing will come between you and the light.

attributes.name: Skull Candleholder
attributes.description: Something very dark and very bright at the same time.

attributes.name: Temple Hanging Lantern
attributes.description: The warm yellow glow of this iron lantern makes you feel safe, like someone is watching over you.

attributes.name: Temple Standing Lantern
attributes.description: This brass lantern is a microcosm of a universe in harmony.

attributes.name: Temple Wall-mounted Lantern
attributes.description: There's no need to fear the dark, even if you're short on table space.

attributes.name: Warm Iron Chandelier - Bright
attributes.description: Made with extra bright-burning tallow candles, this chandelier is the perfect mix of utility and ambiance.

attributes.name: Warm Iron Chandelier - Dim
attributes.description: The light from this chandelier is universally flattering, and will make you even more good-looking than you already are.

attributes.name: Warm Iron Lantern - Bright
attributes.description: The strength of this lantern's light makes it difficult to use for nefarious purposes. However, it's very popular with home decorators.

attributes.name: Warm Iron Lantern - Dim
attributes.description: The soft, warm light of this lantern in your window will always guide you home.
